verses.text: And it came to pass in the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, in the \w fifth|strong="H2549"\w* \add month\add*, the \w tenth|strong="H6218"\w* \add day\add* of the \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, \add that\add* \w certain|strong="H0582"\w* of the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w enquire|strong="H1875"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* me.
Then came the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* unto me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* 
d \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*
d*; Are ye \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to \w enquire|strong="H1875"\w* of me? \add As\add* I \w live|strong="H2416"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* 
d \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*
d*, I will not be \w enquired|strong="H1875"\w* of by you.

Wilt thou \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* them, \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, wilt thou \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* \add them\add*? cause them to \w know|strong="H3045"\w* the \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*:\f + \fr 20.4 \ft Wilt…: or, Wilt thou plead for them\f*

¶ And \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* 
d \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*
d*; In the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* when I \w chose|strong="H0977"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and lifted \w up|strong="H5375"\w* mine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* unto the \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, and made myself \w known|strong="H3045"\w* unto them in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, when I \w lifted|strong="H5375"\w* up mine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* unto them, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, I \add am\add* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*;  +  r 20.5  t lifted…: or, sware *

In the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \add that\add* I lifted \w up|strong="H5375"\w* mine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* unto them, to bring them \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* into a \w land|strong="H0776"\w* that I had \w espied|strong="H8446"\w* for them, \w flowing|strong="H2100"\w* with \w milk|strong="H2461"\w* and \w honey|strong="H1706"\w*, which \add is\add* the \w glory|strong="H6643"\w* of all \w lands|strong="H0776"\w*:

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* I unto them, Cast ye \w away|strong="H7993"\w* every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* the \w abominations|strong="H8251"\w* of his \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, and \w defile|strong="H2930"\w* not yourselves with the \w idols|strong="H1544"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*: I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

But they \w rebelled|strong="H4784"\w* against me, and \w would|strong="H0014"\w* not \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* unto me: they did not every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* cast \w away|strong="H7993"\w* the \w abominations|strong="H8251"\w* of their \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, neither did they \w forsake|strong="H5800"\w* the \w idols|strong="H1544"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*: then I \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I will pour \w out|strong="H8210"\w* my \w fury|strong="H2534"\w* upon them, to \w accomplish|strong="H3615"\w* my \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* against them in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

But I \w wrought|strong="H6213"\w* for my \w name’s|strong="H8034"\w* sake, that it should not be \w polluted|strong="H2490"\w* \w before|strong="H5869"\w* the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*, \w among|strong="H8432"\w* whom they \add were\add*, in whose \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* I made myself \w known|strong="H3045"\w* unto them, in bringing them \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* out of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

¶ Wherefore I caused them to go \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* out of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* them into the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*.

And I \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* them my \w statutes|strong="H2708"\w*, and \w shewed|strong="H3045"\w* them my \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*, which \add if\add* a \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w*, he shall even \w live|strong="H2425"\w* in them.\f + \fr 20.11 \ft shewed…: Heb. made them to know\f*

Moreover also I \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* them my \w sabbaths|strong="H7676"\w*, to be a \w sign|strong="H0226"\w* between me and them, that they might \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* that \w sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* them.

But the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w rebelled|strong="H4784"\w* against me in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*: they \w walked|strong="H1980"\w* not in my \w statutes|strong="H2708"\w*, and they \w despised|strong="H3988"\w* my \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*, which \add if\add* a \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w*, he shall even \w live|strong="H2425"\w* in them; and my \w sabbaths|strong="H7676"\w* they \w greatly|strong="H3966"\w* \w polluted|strong="H2490"\w*: then I \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I would pour \w out|strong="H8210"\w* my \w fury|strong="H2534"\w* upon them in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, to \w consume|strong="H3615"\w* them.

But I \w wrought|strong="H6213"\w* for my \w name’s|strong="H8034"\w* sake, that it should not be \w polluted|strong="H2490"\w* \w before|strong="H5869"\w* the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*, in whose \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* I brought them \w out|strong="H3318"\w*.

Yet also I lifted \w up|strong="H5375"\w* my \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* unto them in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, that I would not \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* them into the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* which I had \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \add them\add*, \w flowing|strong="H2100"\w* with \w milk|strong="H2461"\w* and \w honey|strong="H1706"\w*, which \add is\add* the \w glory|strong="H6643"\w* of all \w lands|strong="H0776"\w*;

Because they \w despised|strong="H3988"\w* my \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*, and \w walked|strong="H1980"\w* not in my \w statutes|strong="H2708"\w*, but \w polluted|strong="H2490"\w* my \w sabbaths|strong="H7676"\w*: for their \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w went|strong="H1980"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* their \w idols|strong="H1544"\w*.

Nevertheless mine \w eye|strong="H5869"\w* \w spared|strong="H2347"\w* them from \w destroying|strong="H7843"\w* them, neither did I \w make|strong="H6213"\w* an \w end|strong="H3617"\w* of them in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*.

But I \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto their \w children|strong="H1121"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, \w Walk|strong="H3212"\w* ye not in the \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w* of your \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, neither \w observe|strong="H8104"\w* their \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*, nor \w defile|strong="H2930"\w* yourselves with their \w idols|strong="H1544"\w*:

I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*; \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* in my \w statutes|strong="H2708"\w*, and \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* my \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*, and \w do|strong="H6213"\w* them;

And \w hallow|strong="H6942"\w* my \w sabbaths|strong="H7676"\w*; and they shall be a \w sign|strong="H0226"\w* between me and you, that ye may \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

Notwithstanding the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w rebelled|strong="H4784"\w* against me: they \w walked|strong="H1980"\w* not in my \w statutes|strong="H2708"\w*, neither \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* my \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w* to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* them, which \add if\add* a \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w*, he shall even \w live|strong="H2425"\w* in them; they \w polluted|strong="H2490"\w* my \w sabbaths|strong="H7676"\w*: then I \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I would pour \w out|strong="H8210"\w* my \w fury|strong="H2534"\w* upon them, to \w accomplish|strong="H3615"\w* my \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* against them in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*.

Nevertheless I \w withdrew|strong="H7725"\w* mine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and \w wrought|strong="H6213"\w* for my \w name’s|strong="H8034"\w* sake, that it should not be \w polluted|strong="H2490"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*, in whose \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* I brought them \w forth|strong="H3318"\w*.

I lifted \w up|strong="H5375"\w* mine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* unto them also in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, that I would \w scatter|strong="H6327"\w* them among the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*, and \w disperse|strong="H2219"\w* them through the \w countries|strong="H0776"\w*;

Because they had not \w executed|strong="H6213"\w* my \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*, but had \w despised|strong="H3988"\w* my \w statutes|strong="H2708"\w*, and had \w polluted|strong="H2490"\w* my \w sabbaths|strong="H7676"\w*, and their \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* were \w after|strong="H0310"\w* their \w fathers’|strong="H0001"\w* \w idols|strong="H1544"\w*.

Wherefore I \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* them also \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w* \add that were\add* not \w good|strong="H2896"\w*, and \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w* whereby they should not \w live|strong="H2421"\w*;

And I \w polluted|strong="H2930"\w* them in their own \w gifts|strong="H4979"\w*, in that they caused to pass \w through|strong="H5674"\w* \add the fire\add* all that \w openeth|strong="H6363"\w* the \w womb|strong="H7356"\w*, that I might make them \w desolate|strong="H8074"\w*, to the end that they might \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

¶ Therefore, \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; Yet in this your \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* have \w blasphemed|strong="H1442"\w* me, in that they have \w committed|strong="H4603"\w* a \w trespass|strong="H4604"\w* against me.\f + \fr 20.27 \ft committed…: Heb. trespassed a trespass\f*

\add For\add* when I had \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* them into the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \add for\add* the which I lifted \w up|strong="H5375"\w* mine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* to \w give|strong="H5414"\w* it to them, then they \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* every \w high|strong="H7311"\w* \w hill|strong="H1389"\w*, and all the \w thick|strong="H5687"\w* \w trees|strong="H6086"\w*, and they \w offered|strong="H2076"\w* there their \w sacrifices|strong="H2077"\w*, and there they \w presented|strong="H5414"\w* the \w provocation|strong="H3708"\w* of their \w offering|strong="H7133"\w*: there also they \w made|strong="H7760"\w* their \w sweet|strong="H5207"\w* \w savour|strong="H7381"\w*, and poured \w out|strong="H5258"\w* there their drink \w offerings|strong="H5262"\w*.

Then I \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, What \add is\add* the high \w place|strong="H1116"\w* whereunto ye \w go|strong="H0935"\w*? And the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* thereof is \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w Bamah|strong="H1117"\w* unto this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.\f + \fr 20.29 \ft I said…: or, I told them what the high place was, or, Bamah\f*

Wherefore \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; Are ye \w polluted|strong="H2930"\w* after the \w manner|strong="H1870"\w* of your \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*? and commit ye \w whoredom|strong="H2181"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* their \w abominations|strong="H8251"\w*?

For when ye \w offer|strong="H5375"\w* your \w gifts|strong="H4979"\w*, when ye make your \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* to pass \w through|strong="H5674"\w* the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, ye \w pollute|strong="H2930"\w* yourselves with all your \w idols|strong="H1544"\w*, even unto this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*: and shall I be \w enquired|strong="H1875"\w* of by you, O \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*? \add As\add* I \w live|strong="H2416"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*, I will not be \w enquired|strong="H1875"\w* of by you.

And that which \w cometh|strong="H5927"\w* into your \w mind|strong="H7307"\w* shall not be at all, that ye \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, We will \w be|strong="H1961"\w* as the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*, as the \w families|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w countries|strong="H0776"\w*, to \w serve|strong="H8334"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w* and \w stone|strong="H0068"\w*.

¶ \add As\add* I \w live|strong="H2416"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*, surely with a \w mighty|strong="H2389"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and with a stretched \w out|strong="H5186"\w* \w arm|strong="H2220"\w*, and with \w fury|strong="H2534"\w* poured \w out|strong="H8210"\w*, will I \w rule|strong="H4427"\w* over you:

And I will bring you \w out|strong="H3318"\w* from the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and will \w gather|strong="H6908"\w* you out of the \w countries|strong="H0776"\w* wherein ye are \w scattered|strong="H6327"\w*, with a \w mighty|strong="H2389"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and with a stretched \w out|strong="H5186"\w* \w arm|strong="H2220"\w*, and with \w fury|strong="H2534"\w* poured \w out|strong="H8210"\w*.

And I will \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* you into the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and there will I \w plead|strong="H8199"\w* with you \w face|strong="H6440"\w* to \w face|strong="H6440"\w*.

Like as I \w pleaded|strong="H8199"\w* with your \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, so will I \w plead|strong="H8199"\w* with you, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*.

And I will cause you to \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* under the \w rod|strong="H7626"\w*, and I will \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* you into the \w bond|strong="H4562"\w* of the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*:\f + \fr 20.37 \ft bond: or, delivering\f*

And I will purge \w out|strong="H1305"\w* from among you the \w rebels|strong="H4775"\w*, and them that \w transgress|strong="H6586"\w* against me: I will bring them \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* out of the \w country|strong="H0776"\w* where they \w sojourn|strong="H4033"\w*, and they shall not \w enter|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w land|strong="H0127"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: and ye shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

As for you, O \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; \w Go|strong="H3212"\w* ye, \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* ye every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* his \w idols|strong="H1544"\w*, and \w hereafter|strong="H0310"\w* \add also\add*, if ye will not \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* unto me: but \w pollute|strong="H2490"\w* ye my \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* no more with your \w gifts|strong="H4979"\w*, and with your \w idols|strong="H1544"\w*.

For in mine \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*, in the \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* of the \w height|strong="H4791"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*, there shall all the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, all of them in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* me: there will I \w accept|strong="H7521"\w* them, and there will I \w require|strong="H1875"\w* your \w offerings|strong="H8641"\w*, and the \w firstfruits|strong="H7225"\w* of your \w oblations|strong="H4864"\w*, with all your holy \w things|strong="H6944"\w*.\f + \fr 20.40 \ft firstfruits: or, chief\f*

I will \w accept|strong="H7521"\w* you with your \w sweet|strong="H5207"\w* \w savour|strong="H7381"\w*, when I bring you \w out|strong="H3318"\w* from the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and \w gather|strong="H6908"\w* you out of the \w countries|strong="H0776"\w* wherein ye have been \w scattered|strong="H6327"\w*; and I will be \w sanctified|strong="H6942"\w* in you \w before|strong="H5869"\w* the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*.\f + \fr 20.41 \ft sweet…: Heb. savour of rest\f*

And ye shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, when I shall \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* you into the \w land|strong="H0127"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, into the \w country|strong="H0776"\w* \add for\add* the which I lifted \w up|strong="H5375"\w* mine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* to \w give|strong="H5414"\w* it to your \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*.

And there shall ye \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* your \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, and all your \w doings|strong="H5949"\w*, wherein ye have been \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w*; and ye shall \w lothe|strong="H6962"\w* yourselves in your own \w sight|strong="H6440"\w* for all your \w evils|strong="H7451"\w* that ye have \w committed|strong="H6213"\w*.

And ye shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, when I have \w wrought|strong="H6213"\w* with you for my \w name’s|strong="H8034"\w* sake, not according to your \w wicked|strong="H7451"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, nor according to your \w corrupt|strong="H7843"\w* \w doings|strong="H5949"\w*, O ye \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* 
d \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*
d*.
¶ Moreover the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, \w set|strong="H7760"\w* thy \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w toward|strong="H1870"\w* the \w south|strong="H8486"\w*, and \w drop|strong="H5197"\w* \add thy word\add* toward the \w south|strong="H1864"\w*, and \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* against the \w forest|strong="H3293"\w* of the \w south|strong="H5045"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w*;

And \w say|strong="H0559"\w* to the \w forest|strong="H3293"\w* of the \w south|strong="H5045"\w*, \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* 
d \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*
d*; Behold, I will \w kindle|strong="H3341"\w* a \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* in thee, and it shall \w devour|strong="H0398"\w* every \w green|strong="H3892"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w* in thee, and every \w dry|strong="H3002"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w*: the \w flaming|strong="H3852"\w* \w flame|strong="H7957"\w* shall not be \w quenched|strong="H3518"\w*, and all \w faces|strong="H6440"\w* from the \w south|strong="H5045"\w* to the \w north|strong="H6828"\w* shall be \w burned|strong="H6866"\w* therein.
And all \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* shall \w see|strong="H7200"\w* that I the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* have \w kindled|strong="H1197"\w* it: it shall not be \w quenched|strong="H3518"\w*.

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* I, \w Ah|strong="H0162"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*! they \w say|strong="H0559"\w* of me, Doth he not \w speak|strong="H4911"\w* \w parables|strong="H4912"\w*?
